scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT modelname='t_anagrafica' 
      ,[IdAnagrafica] as anagraficaid
      ,[Denominazione] as name
      ,[Indirizzo] as address
      ,[CAP] as zip
      ,[Citta] as city
      ,[Provincia] as region
      ,[CF] as cf
      ,[PIVA] as piva
      ,[Tel] as tel
      ,[FAX] as fax
      ,[email] as email
      ,[CodAnacf] as codanacf
      ,[Fornitore] as fornitore
      ,[Cliente] as cliente
      ,[Ente] as ente
  FROM [arc].[T_Anagrafica]',
